long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever gotten annoyed at the constant misspelling of Mahatama Gandhi's name? Don't worry, you'll never see it again. This extension will scan the page for the abomination "Ghandi" and replace it with "Gandhi". 

Check out the code here: https://github.com/collegedesis/gandhi
